name: Shield of the Elders
description:
An alien species has attacked our solar system and our only hope is the Shield of the Elders: a shield that can produce infinite power by stopping projectiles.

Jump from planet to planet and slay the enemies with the help of lethal traps like the Tesla Wall, the Missile Launcher and the Laser-Shooting Turret. But don't forget that this powerful guns need power: the electricity produced with the Shield of the Elders.

*We recommend playing the Tutorial at first.*

*The game has been designed to play exclusively with an Xbox controller (Xbox 360, Xbox One or Xbox Series X/S)*

*Another controllers like the Dualshok 4 or unofficial ones may have unexpected behaviour.*

*PC controls (keyboard & mouse) don't work properly: they were implemented only for debugging reasons.*
